pageProduct.name: Thompson's One-a-day Kava 3800mg 30 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's One-A-Day Kava relieves symptoms of mild anxiety,
stress and nervous tension.

Thompson's One-A-Day Kava relieves symptoms of:
- Mild anxiety
- Stress
- Nervous tension
Kava has been used in the Pacific islands for its sedative and relaxant
properties, to relax the mind and body, to relax the nerves and induce sleep.

Size: 30tabs

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• High potency formula
• relieve symptoms of stress
• support muscle relaxation
• relieve symptoms of mild anxiety
• Traditionally used in Pacific Islander medicine to induces sleep
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly





Warnings

Not for prolonged use. Do not take this product if pregnant or breastfeeding. May harm the liver. If symptoms persist, seek advice from a healthcare practitioner.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains:
Piper methysticum (Kava) ext. 546mg
derived from dry root 3.8g (3800mg)
std. to contain kavalactones 60mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap. Recycle glass bottle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
